author: chirino
msg: Added cookie based session login/logout support to the web console.

author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-7563. Setup HADOOP_HDFS_HOME, HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME and classpath correction. Contributed by Eric Yang.

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-2804. Fixed a race condition in setting up the log directories
for tasks that are starting at the same time. (omalley)

author: kkolinko
msg: Improve message that is logged if there is a typo in the value of protocol in a <Connector> element.
